chunks.text:
New features and improvements

This week's ClickUpdates brings you AI Fields, Slack Importer, and more!
 
 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/5mKtCYlOPU6qWyJt6sxUxRJ5R?domain=links.clickup.com> 	 
 
View release notes <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/oFNTCZmPQtoLqWVs6toUByBp4?domain=links.clickup.com> 	 
 
 
AI Fields: Revolutionize your workflow 
Experience auto-filled summaries, real-time progress updates, automated workflows, and much more with AI Custom Fields. Build any solution imaginable, like categorizing, prioritizing, and managing tasks autonomously.
 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/JnqxC1BKACEoAQDsouNUVGAfM?domain=links.clickup.com> 	 
 
Slack Importer
Import your Slack channels, message history, team members, and soon, even custom emojis into ClickUp Chat. Use Chat to have the context you need in one place—with AI to manage it all.
 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/DltvC21LBTEX2DJsGCYU5VZiO?domain=links.clickup.com> 	 
 
 
But wait! There's more...
We have even more to announce this week, including:
 
 
Improved content editing on mobile <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/Fb3aC3KMDuRlgrJSWFGUQGYs8?domain=links.clickup.com> <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/hZGEC4YN0F7O2wQs4HWU4KTvC?domain=links.clickup.com> 
Experience faster loading in Notepad and task descriptions on the go. Enjoy enhanced Docs performance, moving from viewing to editing quicker than ever.

 
View release notes <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/NFrsC51OGTW7PrQhqI0UkRrr9?domain=links.clickup.com> 	 
 
 
Help us build ClickUp

View release notes <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/NFrsC51OGTW7PrQhqI0UkRrr9?domain=links.clickup.com> 	 
 
 
Help us build ClickUp
 

*	
	Teams Hub (in beta): <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/yIDBC6zPJSGv64AIRSLU5-_Z-?domain=links.clickup.com>  Drive better visibility and manage your Teams with a dedicated landing page.
*	
	Automated Reporting (Scheduled Reports) <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/BLjyC7WQKcWKXBxhMTWUoawkb?domain=links.clickup.com>  (in progress): Ensure all stakeholders are informed by emailing PDF exports of Dashboards on a recurring schedule.
*	
	Use AI Tools in Automations: <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/CWtkC8BRLCw05yZcjUXUy1t86?domain=links.clickup.com>  We're continuing to expand on the capabilities of AI within our Automations. Share your use cases and/or integrations you'd like to see next.
